Title: Relates to requiring every residential lease to provide conspicuous notice of the availability of community solar for the provision of a tenant's electricity needs
Summary: Relates to requiring every residential lease to provide conspicuous notice of the availability of community solar for the provision of a tenant's electricity needs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to requiring every residential lease to provide conspicuous notice of the availability of community solar for the provision of a tenant's electricity needs
